basics.name: Kabir Rohit Khanna
basics.label: PhD Student in Physics
basics.summary: PhD student at University of Massachusetts Amherst researching quantum information and condensed matter physics. Prior degrees from University of Oxford (MSc, Theoretical Physics) and IIT Madras (BTech+MTech, Quantum Science & Technology). Published researcher with teaching and outreach experience.

work.name: University of Massachusetts Amherst
work.summary: PhD research under supervision of Prof. Romain Vasseur in theoretical physics, focusing on quantum information, entanglement, random quantum circuits and condensed matter.

volunteer.summary: Tutored high school students in mathematics and physics during summer.
